item.title: Some change's need help
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

To change the max amound of money, open player.java, and search:

public int maxItemAmount

Replace it with this:

public int maxItemAmount = 2147483647;

That is the max cash you can have on a server.

Thanks

Read full topic
